Name: List Exporter
Author: Kezyma
Description: List Exporter is a Mod Organizer 2 plugin that exports your mod list to various formats including HTML, Markdown, CSV, and JSON. Features include multi-profile export, category separation, column selection with reordering, Nexus links, and mod exclusion via tags.

ReleaseNotes: (2.0.0) Complete rewrite of List Exporter plugin.
(2.0.0) Export to HTML, Markdown, CSV, or JSON formats.
(2.0.0) Multi-profile support - export mods from multiple profiles at once.
(2.0.0) Category separation - optionally create separate tables for each category.
(2.0.0) Automatic Nexus links when mod ID is available.
(2.0.0) Exclusion tag support - add <LE_Exclude> to mod notes/comments to exclude from export.
